thread.title: Denver Police Donate Socks, Sandwiches To The Homeless
thread.title_full: Denver Police Donate Socks, Sandwiches To The Homeless

author: CBS Denver
title: Denver Police Donate Socks, Sandwiches To The Homeless
text:
February 20, 2017 at 12:59 pm 
I am a big critic of the Denver Police, but I have seen them deliver homeless to the Salvation Army site over by RiNo. I have also seen homeless camps that have sprung up in RiNo moved out. Churches, such as Open Door on Marion, have programs where they house 20 women from St Francis one night a week. Open Door also has a Sunday night feed that is faithfully served by churches throughout the Denver Metro area. There is no easy answer, but every little bit of understanding helps.
